sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { clearErrors, getProductDetails } from "../../actions/productAction"; import { useAlert } from "react-alert"; import Loader from "../layout/Loader"; // import MetaData from "../layout/MetaData"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; const ProductDetails = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const alert = useAlert(); const params = useParams(); const { loading, error, product } = useSelector( (state) => state.productDetails ); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProductDetails(params.id)); if (error) { alert.error(error); dispatch(clearErrors()); } }, [dispatch, alert, error, params.id]); return ( {loading ? ( ) : (
{product.images && product.images.map((image) => ( ))}

{product.name}

Product # {product._id}

({product.numOfReviews} Reviews)

${product.price}

- +

Status: In Stock

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

Submit Review
)} ); }; export default ProductDetails;
